name: Popo (AutoGhost)
author: Saffith
info: A recreation of Popo from LttP. It's a simple enemy that slowly scoots around the floor in random directions.
description: A recreation of Popo from LttP. It's a simple enemy that slowly scoots around the floor in random directions.
setup:
Set up an enemy as follows:
Type: Other
Animation: 2-Frame, 3-Frame, 4-Frame, or Flip
Step and homing factor are used
Attribute 11: GH_INVISIBLE_COMBO or GH_INVISIBLE_ALT (normally -1)
Attribute 12: Script slot

Requires ghost.zh, std.zh, and string.zh.
Tiles are here.
